Posts.Content: nydeb wrote: I had a bilateral mastectomy on 4/1/10 and doc put in 400cc expanders.  They are currently filled to 430cc's and he plans on overfilling to a max of 600cc's.  However, my breasts look like they would barely fill an "A" cup right now.  I was a 44C cup before the mastectomies.  I told my doctor that I want to be a full full "C" cup with implants.  He said that he put in the largest expanders possible at the time of my mastectomies and that my only option now would be to have an extra surgery that would take these expanders out and put in larger expanders in order to expand my chest further for larger implants in the long run.  I'm wondering whether anyone has done this?  I'm scheduled for the second set of expanders at the end of September (his schedule if full until then) and the implant exchange in December.  Thanks for your input. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Another Surgery to Put in Larger Expanders? nydeb LISAMG
